mapper.select: -- retrieveMchnMgmtSearchList 기기관리 목록 조회 SELECT [dbo].[fn_getMchnInfoName](MIG.MCHN_INFO_ID)+' '+' ('+[dbo].[fn_getMchnInfoEnName](MIG.MCHN_INFO_ID) +') ' AS mchnNm ,MIG.INFO_MGMT_ID as "infoMgmtId" ,MIG.MCHN_INFO_ID as "mchnInfoId" ,MIG.MGMT_DT as "mgmtDt" ,MIG.DTL_CL_CD as "dtlClCd" ,ACC.COM_DTL_NM as "mchnMgmtNm" ,MIG.RGST_DT as "rgstDt" ,MIG.RGST_ID as "rgstId" ,SU.sa_name as "rgstNm" ,MIG.MCHN_USE_PSBL_YN as "mchnUsePsblYn" ,MIG.MGMT_UFE as "mgmtUfe" ,MIG.SMRY_SBC as "smrySbc" ,MIG.DTL_SBC as "dtlSbc" ,MIG.ATTC_FIL_ID as "attcFilId" ,ACC2.COM_DTL_NM as "mchnUsePsblNm" FROM IRIS_MCHN_INFO_MGMT MIG LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU ON MIG.RGST_ID = SU.SA_SABUN_NEW ,IRIS_MCHN_INFO_MST MIM ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC2 WHERE MIG.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MIG.MCHN_INFO_ID = MIM.MCHN_INFO_ID AND ACC.COM_CD_CD = 'MCHN_MGMT_CD' AND MIG.DTL_CL_CD = ACC.COM_DTL_CD AND ACC2.COM_CD_CD = 'MCHN_PRCT_ST' AND MIG.MCHN_USE_PSBL_YN = ACC2.COM_DTL_CD AND MIG.MCHN_INFO_ID = #{mchnInfoId} ORDER BY MIG.RGST_DT DESC, MIG.LAST_MDFY_DT DESC

-- retrieveMchnMgmtInfoSearch 기기관리 상세 조회 SELECT MIG.INFO_MGMT_ID as "infoMgmtId" ,MIG.MCHN_INFO_ID as "mchnInfoId" ,MIG.MGMT_DT as "mgmtDt" ,MIG.DTL_CL_CD as "dtlClCd" ,ACC.COM_DTL_NM as "mchnMgmtNm" ,MIG.RGST_DT as "rgstDt" ,MIG.RGST_ID as "rgstId" ,SU.sa_name as "rgstNm" ,MIG.MCHN_USE_PSBL_YN as "mchnUsePsblYn" ,MIG.MGMT_UFE as "mgmtUfe" ,MIG.SMRY_SBC as "smrySbc" ,MIG.DTL_SBC as "dtlSbc" ,MIG.ATTC_FIL_ID as "attcFilId" FROM IRIS_MCHN_INFO_MGMT MIG LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU ON SU.SA_USER = #{_userId} ,IRIS_MCHN_INFO_MST MIM ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC WHERE MIG.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MIG.MCHN_INFO_ID = MIM.MCHN_INFO_ID AND ACC.COM_CD_CD = 'MCHN_MGMT_CD' AND MIG.DTL_CL_CD = ACC.COM_DTL_CD AND MIG.INFO_MGMT_ID = #{infoMgmtId}
